title: Level2 Flux Gate Magnetometer Burst DC Magnetic Field for MMS Satellite Number 2 - J. Burch, C. Russell, W. Magnus (SWRI, UCLA, IWF)

info.contact: J. Burch, C. Russell, W. Magnus @ SWRI, UCLA, IWF

parameters.name: mms2_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2_clean
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE) cartesian coordinates plus Btotal (128 S/s). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['mms2_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2', 'mms2_fgm_flag_brst_l2']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Magnetic field vector in GSE plus Btotal (128 S/s)

parameters.name: mms2_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2
parameters.description: ---> Magnetic field vector in Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE) cartesian coordinates plus Btotal (8 or 16 S/s), including flagged data
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Magnetic field vector in GSE plus Btotal (128 S/s)

parameters.name: mms2_fgm_flag_brst_l2
parameters.description: Quality Flag:  0 = No identified problems, non-zero = blank out the data
